data.title: Action Archives
data.text:
Category: Action

Maleficent Script PDF

Maleficent (2014) Maleficent is a supernatural action-adventure family film. A fairy driven to protect her realm of supernatural beings from a neighboring human kingdom casts an irrevocable spell on the King’s daughter only to discover the princess may hold the key to peace in the land. Screenwriters: Linda Woolverton, Charles Perrault (Author), and seven credits[…]

Indiana Jones and the City of the Gods Unproduced Script PDF

Indiana Jones and the City of the Gods – Unproduced (2003) Indiana Jones and the City of the Gods was intended to be an action adventure film in the Indian Jones franchise. Indy travels to the Peruvian rainforest searching for a lost city only to discover an otherworldly secret that impacts all of humankind. Screenwriters:[…]

Thor Script PDF

Thor (2011) Thor is an action adventure superhero film based Marvel Comics characters. Banished to Earth and stripped of his powers, Thor must prove himself worthy to return home in time to stop his brother Loki’s plot to take the throne of Asgard. Screenwriters: Ashley Miller, Zack Stentz, Don Payne, J. Michael Straczynski, Mark Protosevich,[…]

Ghostbusters (1984) Script PDF

Ghostbusters (1984) Ghostbusters is a comedy action supernatural film. Three eccentric parapsychologists in New York City go into business to find, trap, and exterminate ghosts but end up accidentally unleashing powerful supernatural forces. Screenwriters: Dan Aykroyd, Harold Ramis, Rick Moranis (uncredited) Find out how much money Ghostbusters made at The Numbers. For more comedy or[…]

Dunkirk Script PDF

Dunkirk (2017) Christopher Nolan’s Dunkirk is a historical war drama. During a fierce battle in World War II, soldiers from the UK, Belgium, and France are surrounded and must be evacuated. The story unfolds from three perspectives: land, sea, and air. Screenwriter: Christopher Nolan Find out how much money Dunkirk made at Box Office Mojo.[…]

Inglourious Basterds Script PDF

Inglourious Basterds (2009) Inglourious Basterds is a war drama. In Quentin Tarantino’s story set in occupied France during World War II, a group of U.S. Jewish soldiers plan to assassinate Nazi leaders at the same time a young, French cinema owner has the same vengeful idea. Screenwriter: Quentin Tarantino Find out how much money Inglourious[…]

Skyfall Script PDF

Skyfall (2012) Skyfall is an action adventure spy fill. It’s the 23rd movie in the James Bond series. Bond investigates an attack on MI6 that leads to assassination plot against M. Bond chooses to protect her by moving M to familiar ground. Screenwriters: Neal Purvis, Robert Wade, John Logan Find out how much money Skyfall[…]

Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse Script PDF

Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse (2018) Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse is an animated superhero action-adventure story. A teenager becomes the Spider-Man in his universe but discovers there are other Spider heroes in the multiverse. He must team with them to stop the evil Kingpin from destroying New York City. Screenwriters: Phil Lord, Rodney Rothman Find out[…]

DeepStar Six Script PDF

DeepStar Six (1989) DeepStar Six is a science fiction, horror film. A team of people stationed under the ocean in an experimental US Navy facility discover a massive cavern system and a prehistoric beast that threatens to destroy them. Screenwriters: Lewis Abernathy, Geof Miller Find out how much money DeepStar Six made at The Numbers.[…]

The Hunger Games Script PDF

The Hunger Games (2012) The Hunger Games is a science fiction action film set in a dystopian future. Katniss Everdeen volunteers to take her young sister’s place in a television fight to the death. When she and her partner, Peeta, are the last ones standing, they make a decision that changes the game. Screenwriters: Gary[…]

Green Lantern Script PDF

Green Lantern (2011) Green Lantern is a superhero action story based on the DC Comics world. A test pilot is given an alien ring which grants him superpowers. He’s then inducted into a intergalactic force to prevent Parallax from taking over the universe. Screenwriters: Greg Berlanti, Michael Green, Marc Guggenheim, Michael Goldenberg Find out how[…]

El Mariachi Script PDF

El Mariachi (1992) El Mariachi is Western action story that follows a traveling Mexican musician who is mistaken for a notorious killer and must run from the hitmen hired to take him down. Screenwriter: Robert Rodriguez Find out how much money El Mariachi made at The Numbers. Find more action movie screenplays on our Full[…]

Star Wars: Episode III – Revenge of the Sith Script PDF

Star Wars: Episode III – Revenge of the Sith (2005) Revenge of the Sith, a science fiction adventure, is the third and final installment of the Star Wars prequels. Three years in the Clone Wars, Anakin Skywalker acts as a double agent to spy on Palpatine but ends up seduced to the dark side for[…]

The Bourne Identity Script PDF

The Bourne Identity (2002) The Bourne Identity is an action-thriller that follows a man with amnesia as he races to discover his identity while evading assassins from a covert operation within the CIA. Screenwriters: Tony Gilroy, W. Blake Herron, Robert Ludlum (Author) Find out how much money The Bourne Identity made at The Numbers. Find[…]

Black Panther Script PDF

Black Panther (2018) Marvel’s Black Panther is a superhero, action-adventure movie that follows the newly crowned king of an advanced but hidden society as he confronts a challenger to his rule and a rapidly changing world. Screenwriters: Ryan Coogler, Joe Robert Cole, Stan Lee, Jack Kirby Find out how much money Black Panther made at[…]

First Man Script PDF

First Man (2018) In this biographical drama based on extraordinary real-life events, test pilot and astronaut Neil Armstrong overcomes a string of tragic losses to become the first person to set foot on the moon. Screenwriters: Josh Singer, James R. Hansen Find out how much money First Man made at The Numbers. Find other biographical[…]

Uncut Gems Script PDF

Uncut Gems (2019) In the crime thriller, a gambling-addicted New York jeweler must fend off loan sharks by retrieving a rare black opal to pay off his debts and spare his life. Screenwriters: Ronald Bronstein, Josh Safdie, Benny Safdie Find out how much money Uncut Gems made at The Numbers. For more action movie screenplays,[…]

Tenet Script PDF

Tenet (2020) In this science-fiction action-thriller, a present-day spy must learn to manipulate time to prevent an attack from the future that could destroy the world as we know it. Screenwriter: Christopher Nolan Find out how much money Tenet made at Box Office Mojo. For more sci-fi and action-adventure scripts, check out our Full List.

Booksmart Script PDF

Booksmart Script PDF Booksmart (2019) is comedic coming-of-age story about two academic superstars who realize they missed a lot of the fun in high school. The best friends decide to make up for lost time a single wild night. Screenwriters: Emily Halpern, Sarah Haskins, Susanna Fogel, Katie Silberman Find out how much money Booksmart made[…]

Logan Script PDF

Logan Script PDF Logan (2017) is a superhero film based on the X-men movie series. In this third installment of the Wolverine trilogy, Logan’s quiet life is disrupted by a young mutant girl fleeing a group of scientists. Logan must risk everything to get the girl to safety. Screenwriters: Scott Frank, James Mangold, Michael Green[…]

1917 Script PDF

1917 Script PDF 1917 (2019) is a World War I drama inspired by true stories told to the director by his grandfather. It follows two soldiers as they race against time to prevent troops from walking into a deadly trap. Screenwriter: Sam Mendes, Krysty Wilson-Cairns Find out how much money 1917 made at Box Office[…]

Judas and the Black Messiah Script PDF

Judas and the Black Messiah Script PDF Judas and the Black Messiah (2021) is a biographical drama about the leader of the Illinois chapter of the Black Panther Party, Fred Hampton. In the late 1960s, a young criminal is recruited by the FBI to infiltrate Hampton’s organization. Screenwriters: Will Berson, Shaka King See how much[…]

Avengers: Endgame Script PDF

Download the Avengers Endgame Script PDF here or by clicking the PDF icon above. In Avengers: Endgame (2019), after the apocalyptic Infinity War, the remaining Avengers reassemble to rid the universe of Thanos and restore the balance of power. Screenwriter: Christopher Markus, Stephen McFeely See how much money Avengers: Endgame has made at Box Office[…]

Deadpool Script PDF

Download the Deadpool script PDF by clicking the link or the icon above. In Deadpool (2016), a wise-cracking, former mercenary, Wade Wilson, dons a superhero costume to cover his disfigurement. After Wilson is diagnosed with late-stage cancer, he turns to an underworld character named Ajax for a cure. The cure leaves him savagely scarred, but[…]

Wonder Woman Script PDF

Download the Wonder Woman script PDF by clicking the link or the icon above. In Wonder Woman (2017) most of the story unfolds in World War I. Diana, an Amazonian warrior woman lives on a hidden island with others of her kind. When a plane crashes off the island’s[…]

2018 Academy Awards

It’s Oscar’s big night! Time for the 90th Academy Awards ceremony in Hollywood. Below are the lists for 2018 in the categories of Adapted Screenplay and Original Screenplay. ALL of the nominee scripts include links to PDFs for immediate download. Adapted Screenplay (WINNER) James Ivory, Call Me by[…]
